casebody.data:
Robert D. SMITH, Lisanne J. Smith, and Taylor Smith Fine Art, LLC, a North Carolina Limited Liability Company, Plaintiffs,
v.
Cynthia B. TAYLOR, Defendant and Third Party Plaintiff,
v.
Robert D. Smith, as a member of RSFA, LLC, a North Carolina Limited Liability Company, Third Party Defendant. No. COA15-1226. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Aug. 2, 2016.

CASE REPORTED WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Dismissed.
